Generated Narrative: ConceptMap R5-SubstanceReferenceInformation-element-map-to-R4

Mapping from http://hl7.org/fhir/5.0 to http://hl7.org/fhir/4.0

SubstanceReferenceInformation.meta (meta)is equivalent toResource.metaElement `SubstanceReferenceInformation.meta` is not mapped to FHIR R4, since FHIR R5 `SubstanceReferenceInformation` is not mapped. Element matches Basic element path `Resource.meta` and is compatible, use that element instead.

Element matches Basic element path `Resource.language` and is compatible, use that element instead.
SubstanceReferenceInformation.text (text)is equivalent toDomainResource.textElement `SubstanceReferenceInformation.text` is not mapped to FHIR R4, since FHIR R5 `SubstanceReferenceInformation` is not mapped. Element matches Basic element path `DomainResource.text` and is compatible, use that element instead.
SubstanceReferenceInformation.contained (contained)is equivalent toDomainResource.containedElement `SubstanceReferenceInformation.contained` is not mapped to FHIR R4, since FHIR R5 `SubstanceReferenceInformation` is not mapped. Element matches Basic element path `DomainResource.contained` and is compatible, use that element instead.

name: R5SubstanceReferenceInformationElementMapToR4
title: Cross-version mapping for FHIR R5 SubstanceReferenceInformation to FHIR R4 Basic
description: This ConceptMap represents cross-version mappings for elements from a FHIR R5 SubstanceReferenceInformation to FHIR R4.

target.comment:
